product.title: Solios Watches - The Solar White - Brown Eco Vegan Leather & Silver Case
product.body_html:
The Solios Solar Watch perfectly combines aesthetic, green technology, and durable materials. The 8mm thin silver-colored 316L stainless steel case is topped by a Black dial with a minimalist style and offers a water-resistance of 3 ATM. The hardened mineral glass is covered with a robust sapphire crystal to limit scratches. At the heart, a solar cell allows the watch to recharge by itself and offers a 6-month energy reserve. In addition to promoting slow fashion with style, you'll never have to change your battery. The Brown eco vegan leather strap is silicone based to eliminate animal cruelty while keeping mother earth in mind.
Solios also commits to restoring one acre of rainforest for every watch sold. That’s what we call a small accessory that comes with a big impact.
